author: Tay Yong Kwang J:
casename: Kay Swee Pin v Singapore Island Country Club
counsel: Plaintiff appearing in person; Ang Cheng Hock and Ramesh Selvaraj (Allen & Gledhill) for the defendant
tags-parsed: Administrative Law/Disciplinary tribunals/Plaintiff falsely declaring spouse in club membership application form/Whether tribunal adopted correct definition of "spouse"/Whether tribunal acted ultra vires the club rules/Whether plaintiff given fair chance to be heard/Whether proceedings time barred
Administrative Law/Judicial review/Ambit/Court's role only to examine correctness of decision-making process
